title: Replace logo with clothing brand appropriate image

requirements.text: Replace the current logo image (101843004_247003263392167_3873501175990976512_n.jpg) used in the Layout component header with a new clothing brand appropriate logo that better represents Bho Creation as a clothing manufacturing company

quotes: Replace the logo use in corner of the site and side of Boh creation name Because this is clothing brand

acceptanceCriteria: New logo image is displayed in the site header corner next to 'Bho Creation' text
Logo visually represents a clothing/fashion brand aesthetic
Logo maintains proper sizing and alignment with the company name
Logo is stored as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated/

requirements.text: Update the Layout component (frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx) to reference the new clothing brand logo image file instead of the current 101843004_247003263392167_3873501175990976512_n.jpg
acceptanceCriteria: Layout component imports and displays the new logo image
Image path correctly references frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory
Logo renders properly in both mobile and desktop views

constraints: Preserve existing Layout component structure and navigation functionality
Maintain current logo sizing and positioning relative to 'Bho Creation' text
Keep the logo as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated/
nonGoals: Modifying the header layout or navigation structure
Altering color scheme or typography beyond the logo replacement

required: Professional clothing brand logo for Bho Creation featuring fashion/garment industry elements like thread, fabric, or clothing silhouettes with clean modern design (bho-creation-logo.dim_200x200.png)
